statements: SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE allergies='None';
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth >='1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%'
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female' AND date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31' ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients WHERE allergies IS NOT NULL
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM Patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%asthma%' OR medical_history LIKE '%allergies%' ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE record_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_dob ASC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_records.diagnosis LIKE '%Flu%' ORDER BY patients.patient_name ASC, medical_records.record_date DESC;

SELECT patient_name, patient_address, diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE patient_gender = 'Female' AND medical_records.prescription IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC, medical_records.record_date ASC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, COUNT(*) as number_of_records FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id GROUP BY patients.patient_name HAVING number_of_records > 1 ORDER BY number_of_records DESC, patients.patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cold%';
SELECT patient_id, record_date FROM MedicalRecords ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, patient_dob ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM Patients WHERE patient_dob < '1990-01-01' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, m.prescription FROM Patients p INNER JOIN MedicalRecords m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.record_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MedicalRecords GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients ORDER BY patient_dob DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender='FEMALE';
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_reason FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_specialty ASC;
SELECT patient_name, record_date, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' AND patient_dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_gender FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;

SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis, medical_records.treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE medical_records.diagnosis = 'Cancer';

SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, doctor_name, doctor_specialty, hospital_name FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date = '2022-10-25';

SELECT patient_name, patient_address, insurance.policy_number, insurance.provider_name FROM patients LEFT JOIN insurance ON patients.patient_id = insurance.patient_id WHERE insurance.provider_name = 'Blue Shield';
